required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Study on Histamine H3 Receptor Occupancy of TS-091 by PET Examination in Healthy Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Study on Histamine H3 Receptor Occupancy of TS-091 by PET Examination in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
To evaluate the following items by PET examination in Japanese heathy adult male subjects who received single oral administration of TS-091 in an unblinded manner.
1. Relationship between plasma concentration and H3 receptor-occupancy of TS-091
2. Time course changes in H3 receptor-occupancy of TS-091

primary_outcome.description: H3 receptor occupancy is calcurated at 2 hours after administration of TS-091.

primary_outcome.measure: Changes in the H3 receptor occupancy
primary_outcome.time_frame: 2, 6, and 26 hours after administration of TS-091
primary_outcome.description: Changes in the H3 receptor occupancy is calcurated at 2, 6, and 26 hours after administration of TS-091

primary_outcome.time_frame: 2, 6, and 26 hours after administration of TS-091
primary_outcome.description: Plasma concentration of unchanged TS-091 is calcurated at 2, 6, and 26 hours after administration of TS-091

arm_group.arm_group_label: Single evaluation of H3 receptor occupancy
arm_group.description: Subjects received single-dose of 0.1, 0.2, 0.4, 1, 2.5, 25 mg TS-091 prior to an evaluation of H3 recepto occupancy

arm_group.arm_group_label: Multiple evaluations of H3 receptor occupancy
arm_group.description: Subjects received single-dose of 5, 12.5, 25 mg TS-091 prior to Multiple evaluations of H3 recepto occupancy

intervention.description: Subjects received single-dose of 0.1, 0.2, 0.4, 1, 5, 12.5 and 25 mg of TS-091 (tablets or drug substance powder)
intervention.arm_group_label: Multiple evaluations of H3 receptor occupancy
Single evaluation of H3 receptor occupancy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Subjects who met all of the following criteria.
- Age: between ≥20 years and <40 years at the time of providing written consent for participation in the study.
- Body mass index (BMI): ≥18.5 and <25.0 on the day of screening test.
- Subject who received a prior explanation on the study and was able to understand its content and capable of providing voluntary written consent for participation in the study.
- Other protocol defined inclusion criteria could apply-
Exclusion Criteria:
Subjects who came under any of the following exclusion criteria.
- Subjects who were considered to have some disease and not healthy by the investigator or subinvestigator according to his medical judgment based on the results of screening test
- Subjects with a drug or food allergy or a history thereof.
- Subjects with a significant allergic disposition (e.g. asthma requiring treatment) or a history thereof.
- Subjects with a history of heparin-induced thrombocytopenia.
- Other protocol defined exclusion criteria could apply

facility.name: Taisho Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd selected site
